1. The CEO of Burger King is interested in expanding the business to the Northwest Arizona. He does a survey of the people in that area, of people's favorite burger restaurants. If he finds that more than 8% of people like "Other", he will expand the business to the Northwest Arizona. The survey data can be found at "```"../../data/burger.csv"




a) Write appropriate hypotheses.



b) Make a graph



c) Perform the test and find the p-value.



d) State your conclusion.


2. I would like to determine the average number of stars that a Ramen Brand would get. In the file, "../../data/Ramen.Sample.csv", there is a sample of 150 Ramen Brands and the number of stars that they received. Use that sample to create a 95% confidence interval for the true mean of stars for a Ramen Brand.
